response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This item is not just any commodity; it's a treasure that has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs and desires. I understand its worth to you is $10,000, and I am more than willing to extend this offer to you at a special price of $9,500. This is an exclusive chance to own something truly remarkable without exceeding your budget. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer within the next 24 hours.", "product_price": 9500}
